publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4195 Roseanna Cunningham: The Draft Environment Liability (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Environment Liability (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*

S3M-4195 Roseanna Cunningham: The Draft Environment Liability (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Environment Liability (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: Richard Lochhead
